title: Google Home for iOS gets Android TV remote with latest update
content:
Google rolled out a new virtual remote feature to the Google TV app back in September last year. The feature made its way over to the Google Home app for Android in November, giving users who don’t use the Google TV app access to a virtual remote for their Android TV and Google TV devices.

The post Google Home for iOS gets Android TV remote with latest update appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest update for the Google Home app on iOS brings the Android TV remote feature to iPhone users. Read on to learn more.
